sections.heading: of state not pledged.Under no circumstances is the credit of the State of Nebraska, or any political subdivision thereof, pledged by the provisions of sections 21-2101 to 21-2117

sections.text:
21-2117.Credit of state not pledged.

Under no circumstances is the credit of the State of Nebraska, or any political subdivision thereof, pledged by the provisions of sections 21-2101 to 21-2117.

SourceLaws 1967, c. 100, ยง 17, p. 308.
